Value.label: Basic Set Level
Value.Help: Basic Set parameter setting, the receivers make relevant adjustment according to parameter value

Value.label: Turn Off Light Time
Value.Help: When the device triggered and sends out BASIC SET to the lightings, the light turns on and off as the set time. The minimum value is 1, means the light bright time is 1*5s (5 seconds), and turn off after 5 seconds, if the value is t, means the bright time is t*5s, turn off after t*5 seconds.
